document.full_text: chad ochocinco, one of the nfl's top wide-receivers, will have a trial with major league soccer's sporting kansas city next week, the team said on wednesday.
document.title: bengals wide receiver ochocinco to try out for mls team
lines_and_colors: chad ochocinco, one of the nfl's top wide-receivers, will have a trial with major league soccer's sporting kansas city next week, the team said on wednesday.
